column3: turn off my light bulb after showing weather where fog is NUMBER_0 and cloudiness is greater than NUMBER_1
column4: $dialogue @org.thingpedia.dialogue.transaction.execute ; now => ( @org.thingpedia.weather.current ) filter param:cloudiness >= NUMBER_1 and param:fog == NUMBER_0 => notify ; now => @org.thingpedia.iot.light-bulb.set_power param:power = enum:off ;

column3: turn off my light once you have shown the weather where fog is NUMBER_0 and cloudiness is over NUMBER_1
column4: $dialogue @org.thingpedia.dialogue.transaction.execute ; now => ( @org.thingpedia.weather.current ) filter param:cloudiness >= NUMBER_1 and param:fog == NUMBER_0 => notify ; now => @org.thingpedia.iot.light-bulb.set_power param:power = enum:off ;

column3: shut off my light if fog is NUMBER_0 and cloudiness is more than NUMBER_1 as you show me the weather
column4: $dialogue @org.thingpedia.dialogue.transaction.execute ; now => ( @org.thingpedia.weather.current ) filter param:cloudiness >= NUMBER_1 and param:fog == NUMBER_0 => notify ; now => @org.thingpedia.iot.light-bulb.set_power param:power = enum:off ;

column3: turn off lamp if the current weather for some place has fog of NUMBER_0 and cloudiness is bigger than NUMBER_1
column4: $dialogue @org.thingpedia.dialogue.transaction.execute ; now => ( @org.thingpedia.weather.current ) filter param:cloudiness >= NUMBER_1 and param:fog == NUMBER_0 => notify ; now => @org.thingpedia.iot.light-bulb.set_power param:power = enum:off ;

column3: show the current weather and if the fog is NUMBER_0 and the cloudiness is above NUMBER_1 then turn off my light bulb .
column4: $dialogue @org.thingpedia.dialogue.transaction.execute ; now => ( @org.thingpedia.weather.current ) filter param:cloudiness >= NUMBER_1 and param:fog == NUMBER_0 => notify ; now => @org.thingpedia.iot.light-bulb.set_power param:power = enum:off ;
